product_name: Snow Peak Micro Oval Dutch Oven
long_description: Perfectly sized for making campsite snacks or dessert, the Snow Peak Micro Oval Dutch Oven offers the reliable cooking prowess of cast iron while its small size makes it easy to carry into camp. Main pot holds 42 fl. oz.; shallow lid can hold 13.5 oz. and also doubles as a plate. Snow Peak Micro Oval Dutch Oven weighs 5.7 lbs.
short_description: Perfectly sized for making campsite snacks or dessert, the Snow Peak Micro Oval Dutch Oven offers the reliable cooking prowess of cast iron while its small size makes it easy to carry into camp.
